lines.text: Do you want me to kill myself, Gladys?
Not until you change your insurance.
You're too modest. Why, you're a woman of great depths, depths that have never been plumbed.

[referring to her boyfriend]
No, Warren's not much of a plumber.

[referring to the sham wedding just performed]
How much do i owe you?
Well, anything you think it's worth.
lines.character: Mr. H.O. Dibson - Justice of the Peace

lines.text:
[handing the Justice money]
There's two dollars.
[to which Gladys looks outraged, then disgusted]
